mission_statement: Since its establishment in 1975, Breeze holds the spirit of 'for the customers' to serve customers and implement our central principle. As Breeze group’s mission statement “innovative, high image” we provide a variety of merchandise and service. Customer consumer habits have changed through the years, we wish Breeze group will always be the first choice among the fashion elite.Breeze believes in “Something New Something Special” by introducing new brands and high end boutiques to the market. Breeze Xin Yi began the journey in November 2015 and In January 2019, Breeze Nan Shan opened, it has become the leader and trend setter in Xin yi district. More than 15million people attended the opening ceremony! Breeze online will be launching on August 27,2020, and aim to offer high quality online shopping experience towards our dear customers. We expect Breeze group to provide our customer a better lifestyle and fulfill our customer needs in a variety market segment.
donate_org_1: Down Syndrome Foundation of the Republic of China
donate_org_3: Parents Association for the Visually Impaired,Taiwan
and_cancel_or_return_commodity: and cancel or return condition and method
thanks_for_your_purchase: Thank you for your purchase, you will receive your item as soon as possible!
member_a_1_1: Please go to breezeoniline.com, Select Sign up, enter your phone number, email and password to sign up.
member_a_1_2: Or go to Breeze Reward website / Mobile App. Click on the register to join the membership.
member_q_2: Do I need to be a Breeze Online member to shop?
member_a_2: Yes, to ensure you receive the highest quality shopping experience and customer service, please sign up.
member_q_3: Can I earn points if I'm a Breeze rewards member shopping on Breeze Online?
member_a_3: Yes, we use the same membership system, members will be able to earn points both online and offline.
member_q_4: What payment methods can I use?
member_a_4: Breeze online accepts payment from all major credit cards.
member_q_5: What kind of delivery service do you provide?
member_a_5: We deliver straight to your door.
member_q_6: Can I change my delivery address after I place my order?
member_a_6: No, you will not be able to change your delivery address after your order is placed. If you provided wrong address, please cancel your order and reorder again.
member_q_7: What should I do if I forgot my password?
member_a_7: Please select the membership icon on the upper right hand corner, click on forgot password, verify ID and member account (phone number) to conduct verification and password changing.
order_q_1: Do I need to sign for my delivery?
order_a_1: Yes, to ensure the quality of our service, you will need to sign to receive the package.
order_q_2: When will my item be shipped?
order_a_2: We will send you an order confirmation via email, your order will be shipped within 2 business days.
order_a_3_1: Before your item is shipped Go to order history, select “Cancel orders” to cancel your order.
order_a_3_2: After your item is shipped Go to order history, select “Start a Return” to return your item.
order_q_4: How can I contact customer service?
order_a_4: Please email: Breezeonline@breeze.com.tw. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
order_q_5: What should I do if my item arrived damaged?
order_a_5_1: If your item arrived damaged, please take pictures as evidence and email our customer service with your name, contact information, order number and pictures you took.
order_q_6: What should I do if I received wrong item?
order_a_6_1: If you received wrong item, please take pictures as evidence and email our customer service with your name, contact information, order number and pictures you took.
order_q_7: How do I use my warranty card without an official stamp?
order_a_7: Please print your purchase confirmation and staple it with an item warranty card.
order_q_8: Why are my items shipping separately?
order_a_8: We ship items from different locations, so items may arrive at different times.
order_q_9: What is your return policy on electrical appliances?
order_a_9: According to the consumer protection legislation, you must return the product within 7 days of reception. Item must be returned in its original condition with the original tags attached, original packaging, complimentary gifts and all documents and product information.
order_a_10: We don't provide exchanges. If you are not satisfied with your item, please initiate the return process.
